title: User interface code for the Data Management Training Clearinghouse
description: This is the collection of python code developed in support of the application programming interface for the enhanced Data Management Training Clearinghouse from 2018-2022. This API has been developed in direct support of an updated user interface for the Clearinghouse. Development of the API and associated user interface has been supported by the Institute of Museum and Library Services (https://ror.org/030prv062, Award Number LG-70-18-0092-18), the Science Gateways Community Institute, and the Earth Science Information Partners (https://ror.org/03q5xa910).

contributors.name: Institute of Museum and Library Services (IMLS)
